玩了一代後，才知道二代包含了一代的地圖，其實不用玩一代，直接玩二代就可以了。

L4D

posee una jugabilidad correcta y muy apropiada que con el tiempo, podras manejar de manera facil y hasta volverte todo un pro.
Podemos elegir uno de los 4 personajes que tenemos a disposicion, y a la vez, estos nos acompañaran en la batalla por la supervivencia. 

En Left 4 dead, siempre tenemos que estar pendiente, hay zombies por todas partes y peor aun cuando llegan las hordas u oleadas en donde nos llegan zombies por montones. Pero las hordas no son lo unico peligroso, tenemos un cierto tipo de zombies muy fuertes y peligrosos como los boomers, hunters, smokers, witch, sin dejar de lado el poderoso tank.

Los escenarios son variados, que van desde un parque hasta apartamentos, muy variados y entretenidos para la lucha encarnizada contra los zombies. 
El armamento es otro aspecto bueno, podemos recargar, elegir entre rifles de francotirador, mini ametralladoras y la capacidad de curarnos o curar a los demas, hasta ellos mismos nos curan, todo un trabajo en equipo.

el modo enfrentamiento es lo mejor que hay en el juego, es estrategico, tactico, competitivo, una genialidad. 
Tipico de valve

Juego muy recomendado y vicioso


10/10

5/5

Only good if you have a full group of good players that you trust. Don't try to play this with random people.

Otherwise, fun little survival zombie FPS, even with the comparatively low amount of content.
Amazing.  Enough said.  4 person zombie survival at its finest.  Would recommend to anyone who wants to have a great time mowing down zombies with friends.

很多人說買了二代就不需要買一代了 但是其實他們還有許多的差別的
1. 雖然沒有近戰武器 但是推人沒有體力限制(至少沒有像二代推個幾下就要休息)
2.武器雖然真的不多但彈藥(散彈槍)方面真的比二代多了很多(56跟90要怎麼跟128比) 除了衝鋒槍(二代650 ....480真的有點少)
3.最大的不同之處就在你的視角之下(恩...看的到"腳")
4.地圖有些在二代被改過 最明顯的像是 第一章最後一關無線電旁的樓梯 一代有加蓋  那是個不錯的 悶TANK點 直到二代被改過...
5.你倒下了 還是可以射傷隊友...(這在進階或專家是最機車的事情) 準星一偏 幫隊友打僵屍變幫僵屍倒隊友
6.沒電擊器 恩......掛掉那隊友就沒了(直到你在衣櫃廁所找到一個新的)

The last Valve game I purchased.

When this game first came out, I played it non stop... for about 3 weeks.

Unfortunately it didn't feel finished.  Few maps, no mods etc... all were promised to be released in the future.
Then they announced L4D2 and started a storm of controversy.

I am probably one of the few people who stuck to their word and actually Boycotted the second L4D.

If you are going to play L4D1 maps(No Mercy, Death Toll, etc.) get this game.
If you are going to play l4d2 maps or multiplayer, get l4d2(Can't play l4d2 maps on l4d1)
The atmosphere is better in l4d1(creepier)
The Graphics are better in l4d2(Action based)
Personally, I prefer l4d1 over l4d2.

Бесподобно!
Еще во время релиза играл в нее на пиратке с друзьями через хамачи и это было просто невероятно!
В 2к17 про эту игру итак все знают, что про нее рассказывать, однако...
Игра затягивает своей атмосферой и динамичным геймплеем. Лично мне было достаточно стандартных кампаний и кастомных карт, а может быть даже кампаний, я не испытывал.
С какого то из обновлений режим выживания стал адски сложным, без постепенного услажнения, а сразу хардкорным, и прямотаки выживанием.
Естественно режим сражения требует нормального умения играть и если такового нет то вы будете гарантированно заклеваны другими игроками и кикнуты.

P.S. Жалко Билла :(

20块买的L4D1、2合集。怕错过什么细节和剧情，还很认真的玩通关了1代，再去研究的L4D2，发现在2代中，1代的战役地图居然也都包含了。其实这游戏也没有什么剧情，人物形象塑造的还是需要加强，一个强大的人设会让这类对战为主的FPS更加有代入感，暴雪就是这个模式的典范。当然1代还是经典的前身，如果不是为了情怀的话建议直接去买第二部，第二部包含了第一部所有的剧情战役和特性，基本上没有必要玩第一部了。但现在回头来看，第一部仍然不失为一款优秀的游戏

Se você gosta de jogos de tiro então por que não comprou ainda este jogo? mais de 11 mil análises "extremamente positivas" quer dizer muita coisa, não?

Se você não gosta de jogos de tiro então prepare-se para descobrir muito divertimento sem sentir culpa de matar soldados, policiais, pedestres, enfim, nenhum humano normal, aqui só matamos zumbis e de vários tipos... então por que não comprou ainda este jogo?

Dica (em todos os jogos FPS de tiro): Jogue todos os mapas sozinho e depois, só depois, jogue on-line, afinal, você não quer ser kickado(expulso) por atrapalhar o jogo, né?

Pesquise no Wika sofre dicas, armas, sobreviventes, tipos de infectados (zumbis), os modos de jogo, e depois de muitas horas de jogo, aposto que você só vai ficar jogando em 'modo versus'

каляй

Although it is a bit old, it still holds its reputation as a successful team oriented based game where completion most often depends on how well you and your party of four co-operate with one another.  I have spent much time with other groups fighting through hordes of the infected and map levels both official and fan made and have had varying experiences.  There would be groups so dysfunctional that I found it hard to get out of the door without being shot in the back or, no pun intended, found myself left for dead so that my character may attract the horde and my team may get away.  Such groups have their novelties and fun, but it can get frustrating when you want to complete the map.  

  Then, there are the dream teams.  You may die a few times, but you have fun along the way.  You look out for one another and everyone leaves with a good experience that has you coming back for more!  I have found and made many friends here and played many successful missions.  I am especially thankful they put up with my antics.  Such a game has about it a certain magic that one can only experience for themselves.  To describe any further would do it no justice.  The only real way of experiencing things is to gather some friends and brave it yourself, but you must then ask yourself if you can trust them to get you through. Have fun!

Ah Left 4 Dead. I admit I played this on Xbox 360 more than PC and that's rather obivous. But I enjoyed that rather much and more than any other infection game on the market. I enjoyed the COOP theamed gameplay but at the same time still having a story that made your back tense and wish only for more. This game has made me realized that a true infection game isn't about how many points you can rack up from blowing infected heads off but if you can make it to the top of Mercy Hosbitial with your teammates in one peice.

Es un gran juego de zombies, de lo mejor en cuanto a cooperativo, es excelente para distraerte unas cuantas horas tiene muy buenos enemigos aunque son muy pocos a mi parecer sobre los infectados especiales, lo unico malo que le tengo que recriminar a este juego es su inteligencia artificial o los bots en pocas palabras, ya que en dificultades elevadas se vuelve muy dificil conseguir pasar las campañas por que simple mente no hacen nada, los matan o incapacitan demasiando facil, volviendose un dolor de testiculos conseguir pasar una campaña en la difucultad mas dificil. lo cual es recomendable hacer con amigos o con personas que ya esten acostumbrados a jugar en difucultades mas altas. yo le doy un 9/10
